statements: SELECT * FROM patient_feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, patient_id, timestamp, feedback_text FROM patient_feedback;
SELECT patient_id, feedback_text, timestamp FROM patient_feedback;
SELECT * FROM patient_feedback ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, patient_id FROM patient_feedback WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patient_feedback WHERE feedback_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT feedback_text, timestamp FROM patient_feedback ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM patient_feedback WHERE patient_id = '98765432-abcd-1234-efgh-567890abcdef'
SELECT feedback_id, patient_id, feedback_text FROM patient_feedback WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00'
SELECT * FROM patient_feedback ORDER BY feedback_id ASC
SELECT * FROM PatientPreferences;
SELECT patient_id, preference_type FROM PatientPreferences ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PatientFeedback WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM PatientFeedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, patient_id, feedback_text FROM PatientFeedback WHERE feedback_id BETWEEN 1 AND 10 ORDER BY patient_id ASC, feedback_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM PatientPreferences WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, preference_type FROM PatientPreferences WHERE preference_type = 'diet';
SELECT preference_type, preference_value FROM PatientPreferences ORDER BY preference_type DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, patient_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM PatientFeedback WHERE feedback_id > 100 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, feedback_text FROM PatientFeedback LEFT JOIN PatientPreferences ON PatientFeedback.patient_id = PatientPreferences.patient_id WHERE preference_type = 'medication';
SELECT * FROM patients_preferences;
SELECT patient_id, food_preference FROM patients_preferences ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT feedback, rating FROM feedback_tracking WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM care_services WHERE service_rating <= 3 ORDER BY service_name ASC;
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM care_services WHERE service_rating >= 4;
SELECT patient_id, food_preference, sleep_preference, exercise_preference FROM patients_preferences WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM feedback_tracking WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT feedback, rating FROM feedback_tracking WHERE rating < 3 AND patient_id = 2;
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM care_services WHERE service_rating >= 4 ORDER BY service_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, food_preference, sleep_preference, exercise_preference FROM patients_preferences WHERE food_preference = 'Vegetarian' AND sleep_preference = '8 hours';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, name, age, gender FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, name, age, gender, address FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM preferences ORDER BY date_added DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, patient_id, feedback, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT p.name, f.feedback, f.rating FROM patients p JOIN feedback f ON p.patient_id = f.patient_id WHERE f.rating >= 4 ORDER BY f.rating DESC;
SELECT s.service_name, s.cost, p.name AS patient_name FROM services s JOIN preferences pr ON s.service_id = pr.preference_id JOIN patients p ON pr.patient_id = p.patient_id ORDER BY s.cost ASC;

SELECT p.name AS patient_name, f.feedback AS latest_feedback FROM patients p JOIN feedback f ON p.patient_id = f.patient_id WHERE f.date_submitted = (SELECT MAX(date_submitted) FROM feedback) ORDER BY p.name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male'
SELECT patient_name, patient_condition FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_condition ASC
SELECT Patients.patient_name, Feedback.feedback_text FROM Patients JOIN Feedback ON Patients.patient_id = Feedback.patient_id
SELECT * FROM Patients
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_condition FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Feedback.feedback_text, Feedback.feedback_date FROM Patients INNER JOIN Feedback ON Patients.patient_id = Feedback.patient_id WHERE Feedback.feedback_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY Feedback.feedback_date DESC

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Preferences.preference_type, Preferences.preference_details FROM Patients LEFT JOIN Preferences ON Patients.patient_id = Preferences.patient_id WHERE Preferences.preference_type = 'diet'

SELECT Services.service_name, CareQuality.care_rating, CareQuality.care_comments FROM Services INNER JOIN CareQuality ON Services.service_id = CareQuality.service_id ORDER BY CareQuality.care_rating DESC
